Functions/Subroutines

diagnostic Module Reference

diagnostic routines purely for vortex filament, if acting as a magnetic field diagnostics done within the module mag, particle diagnostics contained within quasip.mod More...

Functions/Subroutines

subroutine velocity_info ()
 get the maximum velocity and change of velocity on the filament
subroutine energy_info ()
 calculate the energy of the vortex filament using the trapezium rule, not valid with periodic b.c.'s


subroutine one_dim_vel (filenumber)
 get normal/superfluid velocity for a 1D strip
subroutine two_dim_vel (filenumber)
 get normal/superfluid velocity for a 2D slice
subroutine curv_info ()
 caculate the mean, min, max curvature of the filament if set in run.in will also bin the curvatures to plot a histogram
subroutine structure_function ()
 get the structure functions of the mesh velocities

Detailed Description

diagnostic routines purely for vortex filament, if acting as a magnetic field diagnostics done within the module mag, particle diagnostics contained within quasip.mod
